message: anyone interested in teaming up with me to create a convore client in iPhone
or iPad?
will be working remotely
I was planning on doing something like this, don't have much time to commit to it right now tough.
feel free to buzz me if you want to join
don't worry, there are 3 people working on it now ;)
Do you have a git repo or something?
we're filtering dev's right now, we don't want too many people in the group developing this
yes I do
so let me know of what you can do
Nice, I've decided to work on an Mac OS app instead, so that we can cover all fronts. :)
"give us 30% of all your money or we'll kill your app", the app will be free.....
I suggest you work on a good web page for iPhone's Safari instead. Then Apple won't suddenly tell you "give us 30% of all your money or we'll kill your app". Just my 2 cents.
what about your time lost when Apple says "we have enough of these" or something similar, as has happened before...?
then I'll use my convore app my self
this official or unofficial?
unless @ericflo made it official later on
unofficial
So, there's this one: http://blog.convore.com/post/3748606742/convore-iphone-app
